thread.title: 'We're playing for someone special upstairs' - Simon Zebo paid tribute to Anthony Foley as he reached 50 Munster tries
thread.title_full: 'We're playing for someone special upstairs' - Simon Zebo paid tribute to Anthony Foley as he reached 50 Munster tries

title: 'We're playing for someone special upstairs' - Simon Zebo paid tribute to Anthony Foley as he reached 50 Munster tries
text: 0 Comments Share 'We're playing for someone special upstairs' - Simon Zebo paid tribute to Anthony Foley as he reached 50 Munster tries Independent.ie Simon Zebo's 50th provincial try sent Munster on their way to a barnstorming 32-7 Champions Cup bonus point win over rudderless Racing 92 at Stade Yves-du-Manoir. http://www.independent.ie/sport/rugby/champions-cup/were-playing-for-someone-special-upstairs-simon-zebo-paid-tribute-to-anthony-foley-as-he-reached-50-munster-tries-35349319.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35349318.ece/0cdca/AUTOCROP/h342/Zebo.jpg Simon Zebo of Munster following the European Rugby Champions Cup Pool 1 Round 1 match between Racing 92 and Munster at the Stade Yves-Du-Manoir in Paris, France. Photo by Stephen McCarthy/Sportsfile Simon Zebo's 50th provincial try sent Munster on their way to a barnstorming 32-7 Champions Cup bonus point win over rudderless Racing 92 at Stade Yves-du-Manoir.
